definition: to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
(name of states and dynasties at several different periods)/surname Qi
neat/even/level with/identical/simultaneous/all together/to even sth out
Austria/Austrian/abbr. for 奧地利|奥地利[Ao4 di4 li4]/Olympic/Olympics/abbr. for 奧林匹克|奥林匹克[Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4]

sentences.english: Brazilian defender Emilson Cribari says he's settled at Lazio.
sentences.chinese: 巴西后衛克里巴里說他會留在拉齊奧。

sentences.english: The Biancocelesti are the runaway leaders at the top of Serie A and confidence is high at Formello.
sentences.chinese: 目前拉齊奧正在積分榜上領跑，球隊信心十足。

sentences.english: Reggina striker Rolando Bianchi has welcomed interest from Lazio.
sentences.chinese: 雷吉納的比安奇表示樂於接受來自拉齊奧邀請。

sentences.english: Lazio midfielder Gaby Mudingayi admits he's aware Liverpool are following him.
sentences.chinese: 拉齊奧中場穆丁加伊承認他知道利物浦正在追逐他。

sentences.english: Sissoko certainly can not participate in and Lazio match.
sentences.chinese: 西索科肯定不能參加和拉齊奧的比賽。

sentences.english: Lazio defender Stephan Lichtsteiner is being lined up by new Inter Milan coach Rafa Benitez.
sentences.chinese: 拉齊奧後衛師太最近被傳被國妓新帥貝尼特斯看中。

sentences.english: Lazio are tracking Ajax pair Wesley Sneijder and Stephen Pienaar.
sentences.chinese: 拉齊奧正在追逐阿賈克斯雙星斯奈德和皮納爾。

sentences.english: "Bianchi chose Lazio because he believed in the project, " he maintained.
sentences.chinese: 比安齊選擇拉齊奧因爲他信任我們。

sentences.english: Lazio are in command but we can still bounce back.
sentences.chinese: 拉齊奧整裝待命，但是我們依然能夠翻盤。

sentences.english: Lazio Line Up Caracciolo Lazio are intensifying their interest in unsettled Sampdoria striker Andrea Caracciolo.
sentences.chinese: 拉齊奧對桑普前鋒卡拉喬洛表示興趣。

sentences.english: "I also like Lazio right back Massimo Oddo, " added Wenger.
sentences.chinese: “我也喜歡拉齊奧右後衛奧多”雲格再說。

sentences.english: Lazio, about to start it's Intertoto adventure in some days.
sentences.chinese: 拉齊奧還有幾天就要開始他們國際託托杯的賽程。

sentences.english: Brazilian wing-back Cesar admits he wants a return to Lazio.
sentences.chinese: 巴西前衛塞薩爾承認他希望回到拉齊奧。

sentences.english: A move to Lazio could be on for Juventus striker Valeri Bojinov.
sentences.chinese: 尤文前鋒博季諾夫有可能轉會到拉齊奧。

sentences.english: Goalkeeper Matteo Sereni has returned to the negotiating table over extending his stay with Lazio.
sentences.chinese: 門將塞雷尼重新開始了和拉齊奧的續約談判。

sentences.english: Lazio reportedly offered want-away defender Guglielmo Stendardo in exchange for Lucchini.
sentences.chinese: 據報道拉齊奧想用斯滕達爾多換取盧基尼。
